SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services

Klasse EventService

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services.EventService
@Service public class EventService extends Object
This Service provides logic and usage for the event repository and the eventRegistrationRepository. It provides methods for manipulating the data of these repositories.
Autor:
Lukas Burkhardt

    • EventService

      public EventService(EventRegistrationRepository eventRegistrationRepository, EventRepository eventRepository, MailConfigRepository mailConfigRepository)

  • Methodendetails

    • getRegisteredEvents

      public List<Event> getRegisteredEvents(FleventsAccount account)
      Returns all events where the given account is registered as tutor, attendee or guest.
      Parameter:
      account - the account to get the events from
      Gibt zurück:
      list of events

    • getManagedEvents

      public List<Event> getManagedEvents(FleventsAccount account)
      Get all events where the specified account has the role organizer or tutor.
      Parameter:
      account - the account to get the managed events from
      Gibt zurück:
      all events where the given account is registered as organizer or tutor.

    • getEvents

      public List<Event> getEvents()
      Returns a list of all events in the database.
      Gibt zurück:
      list of all events

    • getEventById

      public Event getEventById(String eventId)
      Returns the specified event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event
      Gibt zurück:
      the event if its existing
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if no event was found

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(Event event)
      Deletes the given event and all according registrations in the database.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to be deleted

    • getAttendees

      public List<FleventsAccount> getAttendees(Event event)
      Returns a list of attendees of the specified event.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to get the attendees from
      Gibt zurück:
      list of accounts registered as tutor, attendee, guest or invited

    • getOrganizers

      public List<FleventsAccount> getOrganizers(Event event)
      Returns a list of organizers of the specified event.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to get the organizers from
      Gibt zurück:
      list of accounts registered at the event as an organizer

    • getEventRegistration

      public EventRegistration getEventRegistration(String eventId, String accountId, EventRole role)
      Checks whether the specified account is registered in the specified event with the given role. Throws an Exception if there is no registration with the given values.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id to check for the account in
      accountId - the id of the account to check for
      role - the role of the specified account
      Gibt zurück:
      EventRegistration of the specified account in the specified event

    • createEventInOrganization

      public Event createEventInOrganization(Event event, FleventsAccount account, Organization organization)
      Creates an event in the specified organization and adds the given account with the role organizer.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to be created
      account - the account which shall be used to create the event
      organization - the organization in which to create the event
      Gibt zurück:
      event which has been created

    • setEventById

      public Event setEventById(String eventId, Event event)
      Sets the event of a given id to the specified event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to be set
      event - the event to be set to the given id
      Gibt zurück:
      the overwritten event

    • addAccountToEvent

      public EventRegistration addAccountToEvent(Event event, FleventsAccount account, EventRole role)
      Adds the given account to the given event.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to add the account to
      account - the account to be added to the event
      role - the role the account has in the event
      Gibt zurück:
      the eventregistration object

    • changeRole

      public void changeRole(Event event, FleventsAccount account, EventRole fromRole, EventRole toRole)
      Changes if possible the role of a registration.
      Parameter:
      event - the event where the role of the account has to be changed
      account - the account which ones role has to be changed
      fromRole - the previous role of the account
      toRole - the new role of the account

    • acceptInvitation

      public void acceptInvitation(Event event, FleventsAccount account, EventRole role)
      Adds the given account to the specified event with the given role. Throws an Exception if there are now open invitations left for the event or if there is already a registration with the same parameters.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to add the account to
      account - the account to be added to the event
      role - the role for the account in the event

    • removeAccountFromEvent

      public void removeAccountFromEvent(Event event, FleventsAccount account, EventRole role)
      Removes the given account with the given role from the specified event.
      Parameter:
      event - the event where to remove the account from
      account - the account to be removed from
      role - the role of the account in the event

    • attendeesCheckIn

      public void attendeesCheckIn(Event event, FleventsAccount account)
      Sets the attendees status to checkedIn.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to check in
      account - the account to be checked in

    • getCheckedIn

      public List<String> getCheckedIn(String eventId)
      Gets all checked-In attendees
      Parameter:
      eventId - the if of the event to get the checked-In attendees from
      Gibt zurück:
      a list with the Uuid of all checked-In attendees
